comment.body:
@AdamWr Sorry, do you know how to use `replace` for this case in Firefox? I was intending to use this rule

```adb
||sudokugame.org/archive/online*.php$subdocument,document,replace=/function adjump/function adjump(nd){var fy=document.getElementById("y").value;var fm=document.getElementById("m").value;var fd=document.getElementById("d").value;jump(nd,fy,fm,fd);};function _adjump/
```

however the replacement doesn't happen. If I escape `,` to `\,` the replacement works but in that case, the string becomes literal `\,`.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mgthai.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmgthai.com) ### Comment > App MG Thailand doesn't work if I have Adguard activated . In the past, I didn't have this problem. I believe this happens since they updated the app las 20Oct25. It finds a VPN. System says "Sorry. The MG isSmartt prohibits VPN". Even I have my VPN off, it says the same until I switch off Adguard. ### Screenshots

> Even I have my VPN off, it says the same until I switch off Adguard.

I can't check the app on my end. What if you disable it in the apps will it still be the same? Perhaps they detect the VPN in the system. It's better to ask [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mgthai.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmgthai.com) ### Comment > App MG Thailand doesn't work if I have Adguard activated . issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
>however the replacement doesn't happen. If I escape `,` to `\,` the replacement works but in that case, the string becomes literal `\,`.

Probably related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/3019
As a workaround, we can try to capture `,` and use `\$1` instead, though it's inconvenient.
Please also add it to the AdGuard Social Media like described here.

comment.body:
Already fixed, but unfortunately MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
mikaylaarealike.com#%#//scriptlet('google-ima3')
mikaylaarealike.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "$", "/\.fadeIn|\.show\(.?\)/")
mikaylaarealike.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "encodeURIComponent", "break;case")
mikaylaarealike.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'WebAssembly', 'atob')
```

comment.body:
Looks like related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210159
It requires to unblock `taboola.com`.
It's popular ad/tracker, so we cannot unblock it in DNS filter list.
Please change DNS server to `AdGuard DNS Non-filtering` and add following rules to user rules in DNS filters:
```adblock
@@||cdn.taboola.com^|
@@||api.taboola.com^|
@@||images.taboola.com^|
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://web.ente.io/gallery](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.ente.io%2Fgallery) ### Comment > I am unable to play any uploaded videos within my Ente library while AdGuard Mini is running with the base filter enabled. > > The issue is not resolved by disabling AdGuard Mini from the Safari Extension. > To resolve the issue I must either reload the page with content blockers disabled as provided by Safari, disable AdGuard Mini from the main app, or quit it entirely. > > After carrying out these steps, it takes around 15secs to take effect, and the reverse takes about the same. > > This is reproducible. ``` Username: @MineGene ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kd7cp11b5a804ow8gk0okcc0so0s4sgasleb0cn4lk.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

AdGuard Mobile App Banners

Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Phishing URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,

comment.body: @zloyden turns out it's the AdGuard Base filter that's stopping it from loading, for whatever reason. To reproduce when enabling the filter it takes around 10-15seconds or so before the video is blocked on refresh.
